mkdir "include/msdfgen"
mkdir "source"

git rm -f -r "cmake"
git rm -f ".gitattributes"
git rm -f ".gitignore"
git rm -f "CHANGELOG.md"
git rm -f "CMakeLists.txt"
git rm -f "CMakePresets.json"
git rm -f "icon.ico"
git rm -f "vcpkg.json"

git mv "./README.md" "./ReadMe.md"
git mv "./LICENSE.txt" License
git mv "./core" "./include/msdfgen"
git mv "./ext" "./include/msdfgen"
git mv "./msdfgen.h" "./include/msdfgen"
git mv "./msdfgen-ext.h" "./include/msdfgen"
git mv "./main.cpp" "./source/"
git mv "./msdfgen.rc" "./source/"
git mv "./resource.h" "./source/"
